title: Peter Mendelsund
description: In this podcast interview with Debbie Millman, Peter Mendelsund discusses how he became a book designer and his fear of the Kindle and iPad.
itunes:subtitle: In this podcast interview with Debbie Millman, Peter Mendelsund discusses how he became a book designer and his fear of the Kindle and iPad.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
